name: WordPress
short_description: World's most popular CMS and blogging platform with thousands of themes and plugins.
description: WordPress is the world's most popular content management system, powering over 40% of all websites. It started as a blogging platform but has evolved into a full-featured CMS capable of building any type of website - from simple blogs to complex e-commerce stores, membership sites, and enterprise applications. Features include the Gutenberg block editor, thousands of free and premium themes, over 60,000 plugins for added functionality, multi-user support with roles, REST API for headless implementations, SEO-friendly URLs, and a massive community for support. This Docker deployment includes MySQL as the database backend.
usecases: Create a personal blog or portfolio website with complete control over your data.
Build a business website with contact forms, galleries, and custom pages.
Set up an e-commerce store using WooCommerce plugin.
Create a multi-author blog or news site with user registration and roles.
notes: Initial setup via web interface - set admin user and password there
Keep WordPress and plugins updated for security
